title: NEW META: FULL LIFE STEAL BRAUM TOP - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

body: i new ad braum was op so i thought to myself and realised that braum has a shield that cannot be hit through. what would work amazing with that. and so i create a full lifesteal braum video. leave any feed back please
